entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
